from.__usage: 'from' string in cell description window, capitalized

author.__usage: 'author' string in cell description window, capitalized

play_button.__usage: play button in main menu, capitalized

exit_button.__usage: exit button in main menu, capitalized

controls.__usage: controls in main menu; separated by | symbol with no spaces, capitalized only in first phrase
controls.__noloc: Controls|movement|velocity change|tick duration|pause time|center camera|spawn menu|paint
controls.rus: Управление|движение|изменение скорости|длительность тика|пауза времени|центрировать камеру|меню спавна|рисовать

start_button_in_start_menu.__usage: start button in main menu's start menu
